basic_data.human_name: Humble Book Bundle: Georges Simenon's Inspector Maigret Series by Picador
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Earlier this year, readers of detective fiction got some great news: Belgian author Georges Simenon’s iconic Inspector Maigret novels are getting a brand-new reissue from Picador. We have some equally great news: a bundle of all 18 of Simenon’s Maigret novels that have been republished thus far, to read along with PBS’s currently running Maigret series! Start at the very beginning of Maigret’s adventures with Pietr the Latvian, a manhunt for a notorious gangster who happens to have a number of mysterious doubles. Board a yacht and solve a murder with The Carter of “La Providence”. That’s only the tip of the Maigret iceberg, so grab this timeless library while you can, and support Come Back Alive with your purchase!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: A new look at France’s great detective
basic_data.description:
A new look at France’s great detective. Earlier this year, readers of detective fiction got some great news: Belgian author Georges Simenon’s iconic Inspector Maigret novels are getting a brand-new reissue from Picador. We have some equally great news: a bundle of all 18 of Simenon’s Maigret novels that have been republished thus far, to read along with PBS’s currently running Maigret series! Start at the very beginning of Maigret’s adventures with Pietr the Latvian, a manhunt for a notorious gangster who happens to have a number of mysterious doubles. Board a yacht and solve a murder with The Carter of “La Providence”. That’s only the tip of the Maigret iceberg, so grab this timeless library while you can, and support Come Back Alive with your purchase!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $179. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in ePub format, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Come Back Alive. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

flemishhouse.description_text: A moody, rain-swept mystery from Georges Simenon that unfolds in a border town haunted by floods and deep secrets. In The Flemish House, Maigret arrives in the rainy, flood-prone town of Givet on the Belgian border to solve the case of a missing young woman. He has been hired by the wealthy Peeters family, who are suspected of being responsible, to clear their name. As he plumbs the mysteries, prejudices, and hidden dramas of this town caught between two worlds, he has to decide whether there was foul play involved in the vanishing of the young woman, or if she has simply been chased away by the oppressive air of this benighted and fraught no-man's land. As he investigates, he finds himself becoming increasingly fascinated by Anna Peeters, the daughter of the family, who, stoic and unemotional, seems to be the linchpin in the strange compact that keeps the family together.

acrimeinholland.description_text: A thought-provoking mystery unfolds in a small coastal Dutch town after a host’s private party ends in murder. A French professor is staying in a coastal Dutch town while on a lecture tour—but when his host is murdered, he’s held for questioning as the prime suspect. Maigret’s assistance is requested, so he travels to the northeast of Holland, where he meets the attendees of a small private gathering the week before: Beetje, the coquettish daughter of a local farmer; Madame Popinga, the victim’s wife; Any Van Elst, her sister and a prospective lawyer; and Cornelius, a student at the Naval College; among a few others. While some are content blaming the outsider in their midst, Maigret senses something more enigmatic at play. Why does Conrad Popinga walk Beetje home every night she visits? What does the local crook Oosting know—and why was his cap found in the Popingas’ bathroom, one of the only rooms that overlooks the crime scene? In a town this small, Maigret knows its inhabitants know more than they claim.

madmanofbergerac.description_text: A man on the run, a madman on the loose terrorizing the town, and Maigret on the case—a thrilling, nerve-racking mystery from Georges Simenon. The Madman of Bergerac finds Maigret on the train to Bordeaux trying to sleep, to no avail. A man in the bunk above is tossing and turning, perhaps even crying. Suddenly, the passenger jumps up, then jumps off the moving train. Maigret instinctively follows suit but is struck down, shot in the shoulder. When he reawakens, he’s hospitalized and surrounded by officials—who think he is the local murderer. Though the confusion is soon cleared up, Maigret’s interest is piqued by the stories of the madman who has been killing women on the side of the road, first strangling his victims, then stabbing them with a giant needle. It’s a case that comes about by pure chance, and there’s nothing to do but recover, bedridden. So using his indefatigable power of deduction, along with his penchant for mischievous schemes, the inspector resolves to figure out just what the situation is in Bergerac.

libertybar.description_text: Sun, sand, the Côte d’Azur, and a mysterious dead man with multiple hidden lives. Who was Mr. Brown? And why does the mystery of his life preoccupy Maigret so much? Georges Simenon's Maigret arrives in Antibes on the French Riviera tasked with discreetly solving the murder of one Mr. Brown, stabbed in the back as he returned to the house of his mistress and her mother. As Maigret investigates, he finds himself drawn to the seedy dive bar frequented by the late Mr. Brown, and strangely absorbed in his reflections on the many secret lives of this enigmatic man. Is Maigret simply distracted by the sun, surf, and vacationers, or is there something else about the case that is occupying his mind? And is it keeping him from seeing the truth in this tale of murder on the Côte d’Azur?

carteroflaprovidence.description_text: A glamorous woman suddenly turns up dead in the middle of nowhere in a tragic, mysterious puzzle that only Georges Simenon’s legendary detective can solve. It’s just another slow, rainy day on a French canal, until the discovery of a woman’s body disrupts the placid scene. Inspector Maigret is baffled by the facts of the case: an expensively dressed woman, Mary Lampson, has been strangled in a nearby stable, with no road nearby wide enough for automobile traffic. Only by chance was her body found, without a noise, witness, or trace of mud to aid in explaining the scene. How did this glamorous, pearl-laden woman meet her end? It seems that those on board the barge La Providence—Mary’s proud husband, Sir Walter; a friend named Willy Marco; and a Chilean parliament member’s widow—might hold the key to the puzzle. In The Carter of La Providence, once again, Georges Simenon orchestrates a harrowing plot of secrets and dramas that disturb, and reveal the underbelly of, the everyday.

latemonsieurgallet.description_text: When a man traveling abroad is murdered in his hotel room, Inspector Maigret must sift through the misdirection and betrayal to find the truth hidden beneath. A Monsieur Gallet has been found dead—murdered—in his hotel room, in a small town outside of Paris. In Georges Simenon’s The Late Monsieur Gallet, Inspector Maigret sets off to figure out the course of events that led to this grim outcome. But as he delves deeper, the circumstances of the crime become increasingly intriguing: Gallet’s alias, his sickly pallor, his claimed profession, his wife’s and son’s strangely indifferent behavior in the wake of Gallet’s death. Using all his wits and intuition, Maigret must look beyond not-so-random coincidences and layers of deception to uncover the truth of the crime.

hangedmanofsaint-pholien.description_text: Suddenly witness to a man’s dreadful death, Inspector Maigret finds himself faced with a series of sordid events that drove the man to despair in this haunting tale of guilt and tragedy. While stopped at a railway station on the northern edge of Holland, Inspector Maigret catches sight of a traveler acting oddly: the man glances around furtively, pulls out handfuls of coins to pay for purchases, and guards a small suitcase. Maigret decides to follow the man, thinking he’ll help catch a crook—but then the inspector witnesses something terrible. The stranger leaves behind only a passport with a false name and an old, large, dirty gray suit. Struck by guilt, Maigret resolves to figure out who this man was and why events ended so tragically. The Hanged Man of Saint-Pholien is a moving and deep exploration into the burdens of conscience and the lengths one might go in pursuit of absolution.

danceratthegai-moulin.description_text: In Liège, the city of Georges Simenon’s youth, a foreigner is found dead, and two young boys are accused of his murder, in this installment in the Inspector Maigret series. Somewhere in Liège, Jean Chabot and René Delfrosse hide out in the cellar of a seedy bar. Their plan to rob the establishment goes awry when, by the light of a match, they see the dead body of a man whom they had seen only hours before. They flee in horror. When the two boys are accused of the murder, their friendship is put to the test, and seemingly irrelevant social differences threaten their friendship and their freedom. A mysterious Frenchman arrives in town. What is he up to? And where is Maigret?

comebackalive.description_text:
Donations to support Come Back Alive are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

About Come Back Alive

“Come Back Alive” is a charitable foundation that comprehensively equips the Defence Forces of Ukraine with everything from vehicles to grenade launchers, as well as implementing educational projects for the military.

It all began in 2014, when a small team purchased and delivered bulletproof vests to the front. Each of them carried an inscription: “Come Back Alive.” Over time, this phrase became the name of the organization.

Gradually, from bulletproof vests the Foundation moved on to purchasing thermal imaging optics, vehicles, and quadcopters. And in 2022, it became the first charitable foundation in Ukraine to receive permission to purchase lethal weapons and military-grade equipment. This is how “Come Back Alive” became a strategic partner of the Armed Forces, not just covering urgent needs but building comprehensive approaches to strengthen the army.

saint-fiacreaffair.description_text: An evocative tale from Georges Simenon that unearths the inspector’s past: Maigret finds an anonymous note predicting a crime in his hometown. “I wish to inform you that a crime will be committed at the church of Saint-Fiacre during first mass on All Souls’ Day.” This handwritten note is deposited at the headquarters of the Police Judiciaire in Paris. Maigret sets off for the village, having been there last for his father’s funeral. As bleary-eyed people depart the All Souls’ service, Maigret thinks the note must be wrong—until the motionless Countess of Saint-Fiacre, upon closer look, is found dead in her pew. Who is responsible for the crime? Could it be the countess’s young secretary and alleged lover, the tight-lipped priest, the profligate Count of Saint-Fiacre, or the new estate manager? Though inundated with troubling memories from his past, Maigret remains steadfast in his hunt for the truth behind this sinister turn of events.

shadowpuppet.description_text: In a dimly lit apartment building, where shadowy figures come and go, a man has been killed in Georges Simenon’s The Shadow Puppet. On the dimly lit Place des Vosges, Maigret hears the sound of a woman in distress. But this is no crime; she is giving birth in a room above. The lights of the apartments across the courtyard flicker, and Maigret sees shadowy figures at the windows. Behind one is a dead man and an empty safe. As one life begins, another has come to a dark end. In this installment of the Maigret series, the Parisian detective uncovers a tragic story of desperate lives, unhappy families, addiction, and a terrible, fatal greed.

pietrthelatvian.description_text: In this first installment in Georges Simenon’s legendary Inspector Maigret series, M. Maigret hunts down an elusive and notorious confidence-man, but finds that identifying him is a game of doubles, intrigue, and hidden crimes. When Detective Chief Inspector Maigret receives notice from Interpol that Pietr the Latvian, an infamous con-man, is on his way to Paris, he rushes to intercept him at the train station. But when he arrives he is confounded to find two men who fit the description of the wanted man. One is alive, the other dead. So who is Pietr? A businessman or a bootlegger? Is he Latvian, American, or Russian? In order to find out, Maigret must use his keen understanding of human nature, his gift for observation, and his famous instincts to track down the true suspect in Pietr the Latvian, the first mystery in Georges Simenon’s iconic series.

nightatthecrossroads.description_text: Another riveting tale from Georges Simenon, in which two siblings, living in isolation, are suspects in a tale of deception, theft, and murder. It’s been seventeen hours of interrogation, yet Carl Andersen’s air of elegance remains unruffled. Inspector Maigret is bewildered by the behavior exhibited by the only probable suspect of the case at Three Widows Crossroads, the location of Carl’s isolated mansion where he lives with his sister Else. The Saturday evening prior, Carl and Else go to sleep, after Carl has locked her away in her bedroom as usual—a curious habit, notes Maigret, but stranger things soon arise. Carl’s faraway neighbor Monsieur Michonnet discovers that his flashy new automobile has swapped places with Carl’s run-down vehicle; what’s more, in the front seat of Michonnet’s car sits a dead man, a Belgian diamond merchant no one purports to know, shot point-blank in the chest. Hours later, Carl and Else are caught trying to embark on a train to Paris. It’s bizarre business, but Maigret is determined to shake off the unease and find out what the residents of Three Widows Crossroads are covering up in The Night at the Crossroads, an exciting, unnerving story from the inimitable Georges Simenon.

mistyharbor.description_text: In The Misty Harbor, a missing harbormaster turns up, only to be murdered on his first night home, in another captivating tale featuring Georges Simenon's intrepid Inspector Maigret. A man, clad in brand-new clothes with no identification, is found on the streets of Paris. Mute, he also has a bullet hole in his head that has been perfectly patched up—altogether a strange fellow, yet affable. His maid Julie soon turns up to claim him; he is Captain Yves Joris, the harbormaster at Ouistreham. Maigret accompanies the pair safely back home, but the next morning, the captain dies, poisoned. Maigret decides to stay, pacing the thickly fog-obscured docks, striking up conversations with busy figures. The new harbormaster doesn’t know why three hundred thousand francs would have been transferred into Joris’s account. Mayor Grandmaison has an attitude that suggests he’d rather be mingling with the town’s social elite. Julie herself is loath to share anything relating to her brother, the secretive ex-convict Big Louis, for fear of appearances. There’s a nebulous danger lurking in this little town—things are leaving a bad impression for Maigret, and he won’t rest until he learns what happened to the captain

grandbankscafe.description_text: A crew’s captain turns up dead, but it’s the evil eye that haunts them—Inspector Maigret must navigate stone-faced sailors to solve the fishy sequence of events. A fishing boat docks at a port in Normandy—and hours later its captain is floating in the harbor, strangled to death. When Inspector Maigret arrives, at the behest of his old school friend, he finds the Océan’s crew will say nary a word about what transpired; instead, they speak only of the evil eye, a curse on the vessel they believe began even before they sailed. Pierre Le Clinche, a young wireless operator on board the ship who had markedly strained relations with the captain, is arrested for foul play. And more complications: in the captain’s possession, a photograph of a faceless buxom woman, scribbled all over in red ink; the captain’s handwritten will, deposited at the police station letterbox well after his death; the acrimony and fear that permeate the entire affair. In The Grand Banks Café, a haunting, riveting tale from Georges Simenon, Maigret vows to find the answer to the mystery that has left every sailor silent.

amanshead.description_text: Inspector Maigret believes a man he convicted may not be guilty after all—and so hatches an audacious plan to save him before he is condemned to death. A man escapes out of the High Surveillance wing of the most infamous penitentiary in Paris. Members of the Police Judiciaire see him, but no one moves a muscle. In fact, it’s part of a daring plan concocted by Inspector Maigret, who thinks Joseph Heurtin may not be guilty of the murder of Madame Henderson and her maid—despite Maigret’s having convicted Joseph himself months before. Once on the loose, Joseph is the subject of careful surveillance: will the accused return to his ring of criminal masterminds, or is he indeed as unknowing as he maintained in every interrogation? With his career hanging in the balance, and a search for the escapee ongoing, Maigret must prove Joseph’s innocence before it’s too late, before an execution comes to pass. Georges Simenon’s A Man’s Head is a suspenseful, thrilling tale of a desperate quest for the truth.

lockno1.description_text: When a drowned man comes back to life, Georges Simenon's detective must figure out who might have wanted him dead before they try again. Emile Ducrau, the kingpin of a small town on the outskirts of Paris, is stabbed and left for dead in the harbor one night. When he is pulled from the water and miraculously revived, he enlists the help of Maigret to figure out who was behind the attempted murder. As Maigret sorts through the complex web of deceit, abuse, money, and power that darken Emile's many dealings in the town, he must also deal with the specter of his own looming retirement. But even as Maigret navigates the domineering Ducrau's attempts to control his investigation, and contemplates his offer of a job, he is jolted out of his reverie by two more deaths and must solve the case before the killer can strike again.

two-pennybar.description_text: In the heart of the Parisian summer, a forgotten crime comes to light in this Inspector Maigret tale from Georges Simenon. On the eve of his death, a condemned man remembers a crime he witnessed years before. With only the name of a bar to direct him, Maigret joins a party of summering revelers who have something to do with the unsolved disappearance—but what, exactly? Descending into the sleazy underside of respectable Parisian life, Maigret investigates and the forgotten crime comes to light.

yellowdog.description_text: An eerie mystery in which a local wine dealer is shot and a strange yellow dog starts to circle the town—Inspector Maigret must navigate small-town dynamics to find the elusive culprit. Late at night in a small seaside town, not a single light is on, and everyone is asleep. Or almost everyone: a man, drunk, departs for home after another evening at a hotel bar, where he and a few others regularly gather. Suddenly, he collapses—struck by a gunshot. The victim turns out to be the town’s most successful wine dealer, and the event soon leads to a series of other curiosities: poisoned drinks at the bar, another man found missing, and a dirty yellow dog haunting the neighborhood, accompanied by large, unfamiliar boot tracks. Detective Chief Inspector Maigret, who happens to be nearby heading up a mobile unit, arrives swiftly to resolve the growing confusion. Though a chill sets over town, with townspeople remaining tight-lipped, Maigret’s pursuit of the truth in Georges Simenon’s The Yellow Dog makes for a thrilling, breathless adventure.

comebackalive.description_text:
Donations to support Come Back Alive are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

About Come Back Alive

“Come Back Alive” is a charitable foundation that comprehensively equips the Defence Forces of Ukraine with everything from vehicles to grenade launchers, as well as implementing educational projects for the military.

It all began in 2014, when a small team purchased and delivered bulletproof vests to the front. Each of them carried an inscription: “Come Back Alive.” Over time, this phrase became the name of the organization.

Gradually, from bulletproof vests the Foundation moved on to purchasing thermal imaging optics, vehicles, and quadcopters. And in 2022, it became the first charitable foundation in Ukraine to receive permission to purchase lethal weapons and military-grade equipment. This is how “Come Back Alive” became a strategic partner of the Armed Forces, not just covering urgent needs but building comprehensive approaches to strengthen the army.

basic_data.human_name: Beyond Virtual Realities Bundle
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Embark on your maiden voyage into virtual reality gaming—or expand your existing VR library—with a curated collection of inventive and engaging titles. Bow down to Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu, an action-packed and heartfelt homage to Hollywood’s golden era of martial-arts cinema. Let your intrusive thoughts win in The Break-In, a hilarious and immersive robbery title where you steal everything—including the kitchen sink. Or drop-kick a random dude’s chest in Drunkn Bar Fight, a crazy co-op experience that needs little explanation.
basic_data.description:
Leave reality in the dust. Embark on your maiden voyage into virtual reality gaming—or expand your existing VR library—with a curated collection of inventive and engaging titles. Bow down to Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu, an action-packed and heartfelt homage to Hollywood’s golden era of martial-arts cinema. Let your intrusive thoughts win in The Break-In, a hilarious and immersive robbery title where you steal everything—including the kitchen sink. Or drop-kick a random dude’s chest in Drunkn Bar Fight, a crazy co-op experience that needs little explanation.

Pay $8 or more. Normally, the total cost for the games in this bundle is as much as $158. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $8 purchase. Pay $8 or more to access Steam keys.

Redeem on Steam. All of the games in this bundle are available on Steam for Windows. Please review the system requirements here prior to purchasing.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publishers and to support Hidden Genius Project. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

thebreak-in.callout:
88% Positive on Steam

A hilarious, physics-based burglary game that rewards creative thinking and cooperative chaos.
thebreak-in.description_text:
The Break-In is a 4 player online co-op burglary game about sneaking into houses, stores, and casino vaults to steal everything that isn't bolted down. (And maybe some of the things which are bolted down)

If you can get it into your van, you can sell it for a profit. And you can use the money you make to purchase new thief equipment, to help you take on riskier heists


Special Thief Equipment

Use a wide range of equipment to help you to extract the most valuable items from your target. Ladders and climbing picks can help you get in, then use attachable items like airbags and pistons to safely get your stolen items to your van

Other items like hammers, firecrackers, and wearable head lampshades can help you deal with any residents, either by knocking them out, distracting them, or hiding from them.


Natural climbing system

The climbing freedom gives you full freedom to get around. Clamber up drainpipes, crawl through windows, or even stealthily make your way to the roof to scout the area

Just be careful to make sure that nobody is waiting for you on the other side of the window, it's a long way down and you didn't bring a trampoline. Or maybe you did, and this is all part of your plan?


Classes and Perks

There are 3 classes to choose from. will you be the sneaky, speedy Infiltrator, breaking in and opening up the target for your team?

Or the beefy Strongman, dragging the valuable heavy items to your van, and protecting your teammates from guards?

Or maybe you're the Mastermind, co-ordinating everything in secret and hacking the vault?


VR / non-VR crossplay

VR adds an extra layer of immersion, but you can play fully without it too! Cross-play allows you to play alongside VR players, even in non-VR mode

The keyboard and mouse controls are designed to give non VR players the same level of control as VR players


Randomised level generation

Every mission you enter has randomised room varieties including different points of entry, so you'll have to make a new plan for each place you infiltrate

NPCs are also randomised, so make sure you scout the area well before going in. You never know what might be guarding that jewelry, an angry resident, a trained guard, or a hidden camera?

Don't forget to join the official discord server! Ask questions, chat to the developer, and make suggestions for what you'd like to see in the game.

elementsdivided.callout:
90% Positive on Steam

A high-skill VR spell-caster focused on competitive, physics-based magic combat.
elementsdivided.description_text:
Bend fire, water, earth and air in chaotic online combat and co-op!

Elements Divided lets you become a peak elemental warrior. Command the battlefield with instinctive, gesture-based controls and defy gravity by hurling yourself across arenas. Unleash legendary powers through devastating elemental combos in frantic brawls with up to 8 players. Now with Sub-Elements, brand new Techniques, new Maps and tons of new Cosmetics!


RISE AS THE ULTIMATE ELEMENTAL BENDER

Step into the world of bending and master all four elements—each with its own style and strategy. Unlock the hidden powers of Sub-Elements like Lava, Metal, Blood, Explosion and Spirit to take your bending to the next level.

ENDLESS WAYS TO FIGHT

Unleash nearly 100 bending moves across Fire, Water, Earth, and Air. Hurl blazing fireballs, bend massive waves, summon powerful air shields, raise stone walls, and so much more.

BATTLE IN CHAOS

Jump into wild online battles across tons of unique maps. Test your skills in PvP duels with up to 8 players, or team up with your crew to crush waves of enemies and bosses in epic showdowns.

FORGE YOUR BENDER’S LEGEND

Rank up in each element to unlock new bending techniques and abilities. Personalize your bender with tons of customization options and show the world your unique elemental style.

plasticbattlegrounds.callout:
90% Positive on Steam

Join the plastic brigade in an epic, small-scale war for control of the household.
plasticbattlegrounds.description_text:
Welcome to Plastic Battlegrounds, the newly commissioned sandbox toy-based battle simulator that includes objective based modes, where your plastic soldiers engage in intense set piece battles. Set up the battlefield with an ever growing list of units, vehicles, emplacements, and environment hazards then either join the battle as a plastic soldier or be life sized and tower over the chaos. Drive fast moving toy jeeps or pilot drones armed with explosives and machine guns. Blow up toy brick fortifications and tear apart your virtual living space in ways you absolutely cannot do in real life!

In sandbox mode, setup battles by placing units, setting up spawners, and make combat scenarios unique to each play session. It's what you could previously only imagine toy soldiers doing, but now they are truly brought into action! Try the experimental Conquest mode where you are tasked with holding the majority of capture points to achieve victory over the enemy team.

This game is very early in development, there is much to be done and the toy war has only begun. Join our Discord community linked in our website to keep up with development news - see you on the battlefield, soldier!

sail.callout:
80% Positive on Steam

The ultimate VR sailing experience, designed for two players to explore and survive together.
sail.description_text:
Open World Multiplayer VR Pirate Game

Multiplayer has come to Sail VR!!!

Rally your crew and set Sail in the NEW Sail VR Multiplayer experience!!!

BUT BE WARNED . . .

You're not the only Pirate seeking fortune on the seas.

Fight off Pirate enemies on land with your Pirate weapon of choice

- OR -

Battle them on the seas using your ship's cannons and crew

Sail Multiplayer is loaded with repayable features including:

  • - Social Lobbies: Join forces with friends or make new ones in the pirate social lobbies.
  • - Player Customization: Customize your pirate look with hats, eye patches, jackets, beards & more!!!
  • - PvP Pirate Combat: Battle other crews in in exhilarating ship-to-ship combat or sword duels.
  • - PvE Combat: Face off against cunning NPCs on land and sea.
  • - XP & Leveling: Level up as you plunder and earn your pirate reputation
  • - Treasure Hunting: Solve riddles and puzzles to be lead to buried loot.
  • - Extraction Game Mode: Outwit and outplay other crews for treasure and glory but you only get to keep it if you make it out alive.

With an Open World filled with Treasure, Mysterious Islands and limitless possibilities there's only one question left to ask...

Arrrrgh you ready to set SAIL ???

PLEASE NOTE: SAIL is in Early Access / Beta and may contain bugs. We appreciate any and all feedback. Download SAIL and join us and our awesome community as we work to create the best VR pirate game possible!

THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING SAIL!!!

developers.developer-name: Red Team Interactive Inc., Continuum XR

drunknbarfight.callout:
80% Positive on Steam

Join up to 3 friends for cooperative mayhem in the definitive bar fight simulator.
drunknbarfight.description_text:
The only limits to the mayhem is your imagination and your moral decency.
Drunkn Bar Fight is a simple, immersive, silly, rowdy game. Now with 4 player Co-op! Take turns throwing bottles, darts, chairs, tip jars or anything else you can get your hands on at opponents. Or use those same items to smash the other patrons to the floor and then toss them through plate glass window. Enjoy performing socially unacceptable behavior without the resulting obligatory visits to the hospital, jail and courts. The only limits to the mayhem is your imagination and your moral decency.

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR

dragonfist_vrkungfu.callout:
96% Positive on Steam

Master authentic martial arts moves, using your own body to block, parry, and strike your opponents.
dragonfist_vrkungfu.description_text:
First person VR Kung Fu combat against a variety of different opponents, with a variety of different fighting styles, tactics, special moves and back stories.

Defeat the Dragon Master... and the rest

When a powerful, ruthless master emerges in the world of martial arts, it awakens many emotions. From the ambitious master looking for a challenge, to the wronged peasant sworn to revenge, to the jealous emperor who wants to be the sole ruler of the people, it brings out many people to fight each other and achieve their own goals.

Step into your own kung fu movie with colourful characters inspired by Chinese and Hong Kong martial arts movies across the decades. Whether you fancy playing as an old wise master, or a young gifted female kung fu student, or a shaolin monk, Bruce Lee inspired character, samurai or a ninja there's bound to be someone for you...

Symmetric Physics Based Combat

"When you learn how to adapt, you will be unstoppable... When you redirect your opponent's energy: you force him to change. So in essence he defeats himself."

Block attacks with your hands or forearms, or bob and weave, push their arms out the way, or move about, how you fight is up to you. But your opponents might use different strategies also, so you must learn how to foresee their attacks and how best to attack them.

Your opponents all have the same controls as you, no advantage, no disadvantage. Except on easier levels they will have less strength - they will also have their speed and intelligence reduced.

Full Body Tracking (FBT) is also fully integrated into Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu allowing you to fully control both legs while playing! Perform front kicks, knee strikes, or even show off with some flying high kicks! Fully match your opponents with FBT and have the Kung Fu battle you've always dreamed of.

Variety

Fight in different scenes in atmospheres inspired by movies, like the dark Red Flower Cult, the misty bamboo forest, kung fu school, (early 20th century) boxing ring + many more.

40 different characters that have various colourful costumes and have their own special moves to learn and use. Each character has their own fighting style to fight against as well as a perk and a weakness

So, take a deep breath, make a fist and prepare to battle your way to victory

Want to offer this game at your arcade or business? Commercial licensing is available through Springboard VR, Synthesis VR, and Foundation VR

arcaxer.callout:
85% Positive on Steam

A full-scale VR RPG that combines immersive, first-person exploration with strategic, turn-based combat.
arcaxer.description_text:
Arcaxer is a turn-based VR RPG set in a virtual world besieged by violent entities. Take monsters face-to-face with first-person turn-based combat, while exploring the unusual world of Arcaxer in a 3rd-person god-like view.

See how far you can make it into the Stack, a tower which creates an endless number of randomly-generated dungeons to explore. Make it far enough in, and you might just end up taking on the elusive, and dangerous, Task Master.

KEY FEATURES

TURN-BASED COMBAT IN VIRTUAL REALITY!

Experience intense battles in first-person as you weave in and out of enemy attacks and physically utilise the abilities and attacks in your arsenal. It’s just like turn-based games when you were a kid, except now you’re in the midst of it.

EXPLORE A HUGE VR WORLD

Discover a world teeming with friends and foes alike during a 20+ hour campaign. Learn about the hostile force known as the Toxin, chase down the elusive ‘Task Master’ and meet a unique cast of characters along the way.

UNIQUE PLAYER CLASSES

Choose between five classic RPG-inspired character classes, each with a unique playstyle reimagined for an absolutely out-of-this-world and intensely-immersive VR experience.

  • Fighter - Deliver damaging physical attacks with your own body
  • Mage - Utilise Hax, Arcaxer’s equivalent to magic, to deal damage from afar
  • Thief - Make use of unique wildcard abilities to turn the tide of fights
  • Blue Mage - Claim the powerful abilities of monsters as your own
  • Dark Knight - Borrows random abilities from other classes, always exciting!

PROCEDURALLY GENERATED DUNGEONS TO EXPLORE AND CONQUER

Explore The Stack, a never-ending series of procedurally-generated dungeons that grow in challenge the further you explore. Fear not, each journey through The Stack will reward you with new loot and items, making your character even stronger.

PLAY FUN MINIGAMES

Fancy a break from the onslaught of enemies? Arcaxer has a number of minigames designed to help you better get to grips with the mechanics. You’ll also earn additional experience for blowing some steam off.

frenzyvr.callout:
66% Positive on Steam

Survive waves of relentless enemies in this fast-paced, arcade-style VR wave shooter.
frenzyvr.description_text:
Frenzy VR is a game full of mayhem and destruction. You are placed inside carefully constructed environments where you can go mad and be free to do what you please in a world without consequences. A VR game where all objects can be a weapon, with the added bonus of having satisfying destruction physics. Ever dreamed of hitting someone in the face with a toaster? Probably not, but now I mentioned it I bet you want to try it! Frenzy VR is great for stress relief, anger management, and of course just having a bit of fun!

Almost every object you see can be picked up and interacted with, and many items can be destroyed. Jump into familiar scenarios such as an office or an apartment, and go mad breaking everything you see!

Enemies fight back! Use hand to hand combat, melee weapons and even guns to defend yourself from the hilarious ragdoll enemies that stand between you and destruction.

Part 1 of the story mode is out now, with 5 maps currently available. 15+ maps still to come in future updates!
With a great imagination, you can have endless fun in this immersive world in free play mode. With the freedom to do anything you want, you can enjoy wide selection of maps such as Prison, Labs, Nightclub, Rooftops, Cruise Ship and plenty more.

Add attachments and cool skins to your weapons! Unlock weapons to use in story mode, or enjoy causing mayhem in free play where you will find weapons all over the place!

Fight unhinged bosses in the large collection of custom made maps.

Mini Games
Along with the regular map that will make up story mode, there are several mini games you can play. From a mystical survival map to the iconic glass panels map, these extra modes are great for when you need to cool off from all the mayhem.

pixelripped1978_anatariadventure.callout:
77% Positive on Steam

Travel between the real world and pixelated game dimensions to save video game history.
pixelripped1978_anatariadventure.description_text:
Game dev simulator! Now you can live it!

| BEST META QUEST VR GAME - NYX Game Awards 2023 |

Pixel Ripped 1978: An Atari Adventure is a love letter to everything ATARI. In this totally interactable environment in VR, players are caught in the eye of the hurricane in a whacky time-traveling adventure where they are one of the main programmers at ATARI and have to get INSIDE the gaming world to prevent history from being rewritten by a pesky super-villain!

Be our hero Dot's right hand in this groovy adventure!

- First-person shooter puzzles
- Power-ups and abilities to help you traverse your journey
- Fully explorable "real" and gaming worlds
- Lore-heavy storytelling
- Groovy 70s soundtrack
- Tons of easter eggs and hidden items
- A callback to amazing ATARI classics such as Millipede, Yars' Revenge, Swordquest, Tempest, Fast Freddie, Asteroids, Crystal Castles, and much more!

Grab your headset and get ready for some good ol'nostalgia wackiness!

venturesgauntlet_theultimatevrfitnessobs.human_name: Venture's Gauntlet: The Ultimate VR Fitness Obstacle Course
venturesgauntlet_theultimatevrfitnessobs.callout:
80% Positive on Steam

Race against the clock and compete against friends in this competitive VR fitness platformer.
venturesgauntlet_theultimatevrfitnessobs.description_text:
VR's Ultimate Obstacle Course & Test of Fitness


Obsessed with his family's legacy, aging billionaire Adam Venture is looking for a capable heir to the Venture name and fortune. His only requirement? The skill and tenacity to overcome a series of deadly obstacle courses known as: Venture’s Gauntlet


Comfortable Locomotion

Run, climb, swing and zipline your way through the gauntlet in comfort and style with TrueMotionVR arm swing controls.


Overcome Dangerous Challenges

Killer-drones, deadly lasers, fatal drops and more all stand along the path to glory. Only the most capable will survive.


Embark On An Epic Journey

Traverse giant cliffs, delve into the depths of the earth and climb crumbling castles across 9 intense stages inspired by the Highlands of Scotland.

  • Breathtaking Visuals - Experience beautiful graphics powered by Unreal Engine. A dynamic time of day and weather system makes the world feel alive as you progress through the Gauntlet.

  • Uncover the secrets of the Ventures - The ever-present Adam Venture watches your every move. Do you have the skill to impress him or will you be a disappointment like all the others?

  • Tailor Made Courses - Calibration adjusts the Gauntlet’s obstacles to your height & arm length measurements to ensure the best experience for all users.

  • Claim the ultimate glory - Compete against other players for the best times on each stage on the online leaderboards.

  • Level Up Your Fitness - Venture’s Gauntlet is the most difficult parkour/assault course experience currently available on VR–you will be physically challenged when playing this game!

thehiddengeniusproject.description_text:
Donations to support The Hidden Genius Project are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

The Hidden Genius Project trains and mentors black male youth in technology creation, entrepreneurship, and leadership skills to transform their lives and communities.

Donations to support The Hidden Genius Project are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

The Hidden Genius Project trains and mentors black male youth in technology creation, entrepreneurship, and leadership skills to transform their lives and communities.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Beyond Virtual Realities Bundle
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Arcaxer, The Break-In, Drunkn Bar Fight, Plastic Battlegrounds, Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Embark on your maiden voyage into virtual reality gaming—or expand your existing VR library—with a curated collection of inventive and engaging titles. Bow down to Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu, an action-packed and heartfelt homage to Hollywood’s golden era of martial-arts cinema. Let your intrusive thoughts win in The Break-In, a hilarious and immersive robbery title where you steal everything—including the kitchen sink. Or drop-kick a random dude’s chest in Drunkn Bar Fight, a crazy co-op experience that needs little explanation.
from_bundle.author: Publishers

basic_data.human_name: Massive Godot Game Development Template and Online Course Bundle+
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Start your new career in game development with a little help from the pros at Mammoth Club! Create engaging characters and dynamic levels with beta-ready templates, learn foundational development techniques through expert-led courses, and so much more. Build your own puzzle games, platformers, and first-person shooters—even get into the real nuts and bolts of game development by creating your own multiplayer lobbies with chat! Get massive savings on the tools and techniques you need to succeed as a game developer, and help support buildOn with your purchase.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Discover your creative greatness with Godot
basic_data.description:
Discover your creative greatness with Godot. Start your new career in game development with a little help from the pros at Mammoth Club! Create engaging characters and dynamic levels with beta-ready templates, learn foundational development techniques through expert-led courses, and so much more. Build your own puzzle games, platformers, and first-person shooters—even get into the real nuts and bolts of game development by creating your own multiplayer lobbies with chat! Get massive savings on the tools and techniques you need to succeed as a game developer, and help support buildOn with your purchase.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $1,899. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. Please check out the full system requirements here prior to purchasing.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Build On. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

claudeforgamedevelopers_creategenerative.human_name: Claude for Game Developers: Create Generative AI Games Using Unreal Blueprints, Godot, and Unity C#
claudeforgamedevelopers_creategenerative.description_text:
Integrate Claude AI into your games to create dynamic content, intelligent NPCs, and adaptive experiences that respond naturally to player actions.

  • Connect Claude AI to Unreal Engine using Blueprints.
  • Implement Claude in Godot and Unity with C#.
  • Design AI-driven dialogue systems and narrative generation.
  • Create NPCs that respond intelligently to player input.
  • Build game systems that leverage AI for procedural content and assistance.

This course is designed for game developers exploring how AI can enhance player experiences. By the end, you'll create games with genuinely intelligent, adaptive systems powered by Claude AI.

godot4aiandmachinelearningmasterclass_tr.human_name: Godot 4 AI & Machine Learning Masterclass: Train Smart Game Characters and Build Neural Networks
godot4aiandmachinelearningmasterclass_tr.description_text:
Give your game characters genuine intelligence and adaptive behavior instead of predictable, scripted patterns that players quickly exploit.

  • Understand neural networks and how they apply to game AI.
  • Train characters that learn from player behavior and adapt strategies.
  • Implement machine learning algorithms within Godot's framework.
  • Build decision-making systems that feel dynamic and unpredictable.
  • Create AI opponents that provide appropriate challenge without feeling unfair.

This course is designed for developers ready to push beyond traditional AI techniques. By the end, you'll create game characters with emergent behaviors that surprise both you and your players.

jurassicgarden3dgametemplate_idlesimulat.human_name: Jurassic Garden 3D Game Template: Idle Simulation in Godot 4.6
jurassicgarden3dgametemplate_idlesimulat.description_text:
Dive into a complete 3D game kit where players can buy dinosaur eggs, watch them grow, and sell fully grown dinosaurs to expand their prehistoric paradise. Featuring textured 3D models and a smooth idle progression system, this template blends relaxing gameplay with satisfying growth mechanics.

Players can enjoy managing their Jurassic ecosystem while earning and reinvesting profits to unlock new species and upgrades. Perfect for developers creating idle tycoon or incremental simulation games, this fully customizable project provides an immersive foundation to build your own calming yet rewarding dino management experience.

ultimatealgorithmsanddatastructurescours.human_name: The Ultimate Algorithms and Data Structures Course: Build Real-World Expertise in Graphs, Trees and Pathfinding
ultimatealgorithmsanddatastructurescours.description_text:
Move past memorizing structures and truly understand how graphs, trees, and pathfinding algorithms power everything from game AI to social networks.

  • Implement graph structures and traversal algorithms from scratch.
  • Master tree data structures including BSTs, heaps, and tries.
  • Build pathfinding algorithms like A*, Dijkstra, and breadth-first search.
  • Apply these structures to solve practical problems in games and applications.
  • Optimize algorithms for real-world performance constraints.

This course is designed for developers who want to understand the "why" behind data structures, not just the "what." By the end, you'll recognize when to use each structure and implement them confidently in your projects.

basicdefender2d-stylegameingodot46.human_name: Basic 2D Defender-Style Game Template in Godot 4.6
basicdefender2d-stylegameingodot46.description_text:
Designed for both beginners and intermediate Godot users, this project walks you through every system that powers a fast-paced arcade shooter — from smooth player controls and AI-driven enemies to wave spawning, scoring, and UI design.

You’ll explore key mechanics such as 8-directional movement, world wraparound scrolling, and progressive enemy waves with four unique AI types: Basic, Sine Wave, Hunter, and Bomber. Along the way, you’ll learn to manage collisions, health, and scoring, while customizing difficulty and visuals through easily tweakable export variables.

The project also features enhanced UI screens — including a polished main menu with Start, How to Play, and Quit options, plus a Game Over screen with retry and score display. Each system is modular, clearly commented, and designed for effortless modification, letting you expand it with new weapons, power-ups, or enemies.

Perfect for learning Godot’s 2D workflow, this template gives you a complete, professional-quality starting point for building your own side-scrolling shooters.

3duiessentialsforgamedevelopers_godot4an.human_name: 3D UI Essentials for Game Developers: Godot 4 and C#
3duiessentialsforgamedevelopers_godot4an.description_text:
Create intuitive, visually appealing interfaces that enhance rather than obstruct the 3D game experience, solving the unique challenges of UI in three-dimensional space.

  • Design UI that works naturally within 3D environments.
  • Implement diegetic interfaces that feel integrated into your game world.
  • Build responsive menus, HUDs, and interactive UI elements in C#.
  • Handle UI scaling, anchoring, and positioning in 3D space.
  • Create accessible, readable interfaces that don't break immersion.

This course is designed for developers who want their 3D games to feel polished and professional. By the end, you'll craft UI systems that players barely notice — because they work exactly as expected.

chess3dgamewithaitemplateingodot46.human_name: Chess3D Game with AI Template in Godot 4.6
chess3dgamewithaitemplateingodot46.description_text:
Complete 3D Chess Game template for Godot 4. Features drag-and-drop piece movement, AI opponent using Minimax algorithm, full chess rules validation, check/checkmate detection, move history, and undo system. Clean, modular code perfect for learning game development, AI programming, and 3D interaction. Includes all assets and comprehensive documentation. Ideal for beginners and students.

This template demonstrates professional game development practices including signal-driven architecture, state management, and component decoupling.Comes with 12 detailed chess piece models, complete scene setup, and step-by-step guide for extending features like castling, en passant, multiplayer, sound effects, and custom AI difficulty. Perfect foundation for building strategy games, board games, or turn-based systems.

wordcube3d_puzzlequestgametemplateingodo.human_name: WordCube 3D: Puzzle Quest Game Template in Godot 4.6
wordcube3d_puzzlequestgametemplateingodo.description_text:
A unique 3D twist on classic word search puzzles. Players search for hidden words on the surfaces of a rotating 3D cube, combining spatial reasoning with vocabulary skills. Each of the cube's 6 faces contains complete words that must be found before time runs out.

This template has 512 interactive letters, countdown timer, hint system, and 4 levels. Features smart word placement, smooth controls, professional architecture, and full documentation. Perfect for learning 3D puzzle mechanics and word game development. Easily customizable for themed categories, difficulty modes, and multiplayer.

40-hourpixelartbundlewithcharactersand2d.human_name: 40-Hour Pixel Art Bundle with Characters and 2D Game Maps
40-hourpixelartbundlewithcharactersand2d.description_text:
Embark on the ultimate pixel art journey — from the tiniest 8x8 sprites to detailed 128x128 masterpieces — with this all-in-one Piskel video tutorial and asset bundle. You’ll create everything from colorful cloud and fruit sprites to intricate elephants, forests, and outer space scenes, while also mastering RPG character art, warrior sprites, monster designs, and full game maps. Learn to build and animate platformer and sidescroller environments, complete map tiles, and pixel-perfect worlds that bring your game ideas to life. Every tutorial guides you step-by-step through design, shading, animation, and scene composition inside Piskel.

Best of all, every course includes downloadable assets and project files, so you can follow along, customize, and reuse your creations in your own games. You’ll gain lifetime access to a growing collection of pixel art tutorials covering characters, maps, environments, and animations — everything you need to build your dream retro or modern game in Piskel. Whether you’re designing a cozy RPG village, a platformer, or a fast-paced sidescroller, this bundle gives you the complete toolkit to turn imagination into pixel perfection.

godotgamedeveloperinterviewmasterclass_s.human_name: Godot Game Developer Interview Masterclass: Stand Out and Land Your Dream Role
godotgamedeveloperinterviewmasterclass_s.description_text:
Bridge the gap between having skills and proving them to hiring managers who review hundreds of candidates for every game development position.

  • Build a portfolio that showcases your Godot expertise effectively.
  • Prepare for technical interviews with common Godot and game dev questions.
  • Learn to discuss your projects and code in ways that impress interviewers.
  • Understand what studios look for in Godot developers specifically.
  • Practice presenting yourself confidently and handling difficult questions.

This course is designed for developers ready to transition into professional game development roles. By the end, you'll have the interview skills and portfolio strategy to stand out in a competitive market and secure the position you want.

match-3gametemplateingodot46.description_text:
A match-3 puzzle game with swap mechanics, special pieces, combo system, and progressive difficulty. Players swap colored pieces on an 8x8 grid to create matches of three or more, earning points through strategic combos and activating powerful special pieces including striped pieces, bombs, and color bombs with explosive clearing effects.

This template includes 10+ files with 600+ lines of GDScript, featuring an 8x8 grid system with 6 vibrant piece colors, 3 special piece types with unique activation effects, click-to-select controls with visual feedback, and a complete main menu with tutorial overlay.

completesurvivalgamedevelopmentmastercla.human_name: The Complete Survival Game Development Masterclass in Godot 4
completesurvivalgamedevelopmentmastercla.description_text:
Tackle the intricate web of interconnected systems that make survival games compelling from resource gathering to crafting, hunger, and environmental threats.

  • Design and implement resource collection and inventory management systems.
  • Build crafting mechanics with recipes and item combinations.
  • Create survival stats like hunger, thirst, and health that drive player decisions.
  • Develop day/night cycles and environmental hazards.
  • Construct base-building mechanics and persistent world states.

This course is designed for developers ready to handle complex, interdependent game systems. By the end, you'll understand how to weave multiple mechanics together into a cohesive survival experience that keeps players engaged and challenged.

basicenemyaicontroller_lineofsightdetect.human_name: Basic Enemy AI Controller - Line of Sight Detection in Godot 4.6
basicenemyaicontroller_lineofsightdetect.description_text:
This Enemy AI system provides game developers with a complete, modular solution for implementing intelligent enemy behavior in 3D action games. Built on a clean Finite State Machine architecture, it features three core states: patrol (waypoint-based movement), chase (player pursuit with line-of-sight tracking), and attack (range-based combat with cooldown system).

The AI uses sophisticated detection combining distance checks, configurable field-of-view angles, and raycast-based line-of-sight verification to create realistic awareness. Every parameter is exposed in Godot's inspector for easy tweaking, from movement speeds and detection ranges to attack cooldowns and lost-player timeouts, making it effortless to create anything from stealthy guards to aggressive hunters without touching code.

Designed for maximum flexibility and ease of use, this template includes comprehensive documentation, a fully functional test scene, and clean, heavily-commented GDScript code that serves as both a working system and a learning resource.

basicthird-person3dcharactertemplateingo.human_name: Basic Third-Person 3D Character Template in Godot 4.6
basicthird-person3dcharactertemplateingo.description_text: Third-Person Character Controller is a functional Godot 4.6 project template of a modern 3D adventure/platformer game with orbit camera, WASD movement, double jumping, sprint mechanics, and basic attack output. It's structured as a clean, modular learning asset ideal for students who want to understand 3D character control, camera management, collision detection, enemy AI systems, and third-person game mechanics.  The project includes dedicated scripts for player control (player_controller.gd), camera management (orbit_camera.gd), enemy behavior (enemy.gd), and UI systems (game_ui.gd). All game entities use simple geometric shapes with proper collision layers for easy customization. The template demonstrates best practices for smooth character movement, camera collision avoidance, state machines, input buffering, and modular script architecture.

beyondthebasics_thecompleteguidetoadvanc.human_name: Beyond the Basics: The Complete Guide to Advanced Algorithms for Modern Developers
beyondthebasics_thecompleteguidetoadvanc.description_text:
Break through the intermediate plateau where basic algorithms aren't enough and tackle complex problems that require sophisticated computational thinking.

  • Master advanced algorithmic techniques like dynamic programming and greedy algorithms.
  • Analyze time and space complexity for real-world optimization decisions.
  • Solve challenging problems involving strings, arrays, and advanced data manipulation.
  • Apply algorithmic strategies to system design and scalability challenges.
  • Develop the problem-solving intuition that separates senior developers from juniors.

This course is designed for developers ready to move beyond tutorials and handle genuinely difficult computational challenges. By the end, you'll approach complex problems with confidence and choose the right algorithmic strategies for performance-critical applications.

lostinthewoods_3dvisualnovelgametemplate.human_name: Lost in the Woods - 3D Visual Novel Game Template in Godot 4.6
lostinthewoods_3dvisualnovelgametemplate.description_text:
Unlock immersive storytelling with this complete 3D visual novel framework. The template's dynamic camera system delivers smooth, cinematic transitions between locations with floating animations and interactive object manipulation (rotate the witch's hat, lift the cauldron).

The advanced dialogue system includes typewriter text effects with full character support, while the choice mechanics feature interactive decision points with sophisticated conditional logic that can show or hide options based on story flags. The JSON-based scripting system makes story creation as simple as editing a text file.

Stop building from scratch and start creating immediately! Whether you're creating a single linear narrative or a complex multi-route story with hundreds of choices, this template handles all the technical complexity while giving you complete creative control over your story's content and flow.

vrgamecreationingodot4_fromwebxrsetuptoi.human_name: VR Game Creation in Godot 4: From WebXR Setup to Immersion
vrgamecreationingodot4_fromwebxrsetuptoi.description_text:
Navigate the technical complexity of VR development and create truly immersive experiences that take advantage of the medium's unique possibilities.

  • Set up WebXR and VR environments in Godot 4 from scratch.
  • Design comfortable locomotion and interaction systems that prevent motion sickness.
  • Implement hand tracking, controllers, and natural VR interfaces.
  • Create spatial audio and environmental design for immersion.
  • Optimize performance for smooth, comfortable VR experiences.

This course is designed for developers curious about VR but unsure where to start. By the end, you'll have the technical foundation and design knowledge to create VR games that feel natural and immersive.

generativeaiappdevelopmentmasterclass_bu.human_name: Generative AI App Development Masterclass: Build AI-Powered Projects with Google Gemini in Python, Unreal 5, Godot, and Unity
generativeaiappdevelopmentmasterclass_bu.description_text:
Harness generative AI capabilities across multiple platforms instead of being locked into one ecosystem or struggling with fragmented documentation.

  • Integrate Google Gemini API into Python applications and game engines.
  • Build AI-powered features like dynamic dialogue, content generation, and assistants.
  • Implement generative AI in Unreal 5, Godot, and Unity projects.
  • Handle API calls, responses, and error management effectively.
  • Create practical applications that leverage AI for real user value.

This course is designed for developers who want to add cutting-edge AI features to their projects. By the end, you'll integrate generative AI across multiple platforms and create applications that feel intelligent and responsive.

machinelearninganddeeplearningalgorithms.human_name: Machine Learning and Deep Learning Algorithms: From Fundamentals to Advanced AI
machinelearninganddeeplearningalgorithms.description_text:
Demystify the mathematics and concepts behind ML and deep learning, and gain practical skills to implement algorithms instead of just using black-box libraries.

  • Understand foundational machine learning concepts and when to apply them.
  • Implement algorithms from scratch to grasp how they actually work.
  • Build and train neural networks for various problem types.
  • Explore deep learning architectures and their practical applications.
  • Debug, optimize, and evaluate ML models effectively.

This course is designed for developers and technical professionals who want genuine understanding, not just surface-level familiarity. By the end, you'll have the knowledge to build, train, and deploy machine learning solutions with confidence.

masteringturn-basedrpgdevelopmentingodot.human_name: Mastering Turn-Based RPG Development in Godot 4
masteringturn-basedrpgdevelopmentingodot.description_text:
Conquer the unique challenges of turn-based combat, character progression, and strategic depth that define compelling RPG experiences.

  • Design turn-based combat systems with actions, targeting, and turn order.
  • Implement character stats, progression, and ability systems.
  • Build inventory management and equipment mechanics.
  • Create enemy AI that provides tactical challenge without frustration.
  • Develop battle UI and feedback systems that communicate information clearly.

This course is designed for developers who want to create strategic, engaging RPG combat. By the end, you'll have the technical foundation to build turn-based systems that feel satisfying and reward player planning.

first-person3dcontrollertemplateingodot4.description_text:
This First-Person Controller template for Godot 4 provides everything you need to get your 3D game up and running in minutes. Built with clean, well-documented GDScript, it features smooth WASD movement with acceleration and deceleration, responsive jumping mechanics, a fully functional sprint system, and toggle crouch with automatic ceiling detection. The mouse-look system includes vertical angle clamping and optional head bobbing for added immersion. All parameters are exposed through Godot's Inspector, making it incredibly easy to customize without diving into code. The template uses CharacterBody3D for predictable, game-like physics and includes a complete test level with platforms, walls, and obstacles so you can immediately see all features in action.

Whether you're a beginner learning game development, an intermediate developer wanting to skip the basics, or an experienced programmer needing a solid foundation for rapid prototyping, this template has you covered.

godot46gamefundamentalscrashcourse.description_text:
Master the essentials of Godot 4.6 by creating a 2D coin catcher game from start to finish. This crash course covers scene organization, player movement, collisions, UI design, and game flow — while walking through the logic behind each major line of code.

You’ll build systems for spawning coins, tracking score and time, and handling game-over states using nodes, signals, and physics processing. While no prior Godot knowledge is required, some programming experience will help you follow along smoothly.

The project includes a few simple external assets, clean GDScript code, and a modular structure you can easily expand into your own projects — making it the ideal starting point for learning Godot development.

basicsoncforgameandappdevelopers_buildin.human_name: The Basics on C# for Game and App Developers: Building a Strong Coding Foundation
basicsoncforgameandappdevelopers_buildin.description_text:
Build genuine programming competence in C# instead of copying code you don't understand or getting stuck when problems arise.

  • Master C# syntax, data types, and control structures from the ground up.
  • Understand object-oriented programming concepts through practical examples.
  • Write clean, maintainable code following best practices.
  • Debug effectively and understand error messages.
  • Apply C# fundamentals to both game and application development contexts.

This course is designed for aspiring developers who want to truly understand programming, not just follow tutorials. By the end, you'll write C# code confidently and adapt solutions to your specific needs.

inventoryandequipmentsystemtemplateingod.human_name: Inventory & Equipment System Template in Godot 4.6
inventoryandequipmentsystemtemplateingod.description_text:
An inventory management system with drag-and-drop mechanics, equipment slots, and world item integration. Players can organize items in a slot-based grid, stack resources, equip gear across 8 body slots, and interact with items through intuitive right-click menus and hover tooltips.

This template includes 44 files with 1,309 lines of GDScript, featuring 20 customizable inventory slots, 8 equipment slots (Head, Chest, Weapon, Shield, etc.), drag-and-drop with split-stacking, rarity-colored borders, and both 2D/3D world item pickups. Includes 150+ features: context menus, visual tooltips, auto-stacking, save/load serialization, and 5 example items spanning all rarity tiers.

buildon.description_text:
Donations to support buildOn are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

buildOn’s mission is to break the cycle of poverty, illiteracy, and low expectations through service and education. They mobilize U.S. students to transform their communities through service and change the world by building schools in developing countries.

checkers3d_strategicboardgametemplatewit.human_name: Checkers 3D: Strategic Board Game Template with AI in Godot 4.6
checkers3d_strategicboardgametemplatewit.description_text:
A modern 3D implementation of the classic checkers board game with stunning visuals and intelligent gameplay. Players compete to capture opponent pieces or block their moves through strategic positioning, with optional captures allowing tactical depth beyond traditional forced-jump rules. Features a professional wooden checkerboard with realistic materials, clear visual indicators (flat circles for selection and valid moves), and a challenging AI opponent that prioritizes captures, promotions, and board control.

This template includes 24 interactive pieces with collision detection, AI decision system with move evaluation, persistent score tracking across games, match history, and two game modes (Player vs Player and Player vs AI). Features clean architecture with separated game logic, raycasting-based input, comprehensive move validation, and full documentation. Perfect for learning board game AI implementation, 3D click interaction, and turn-based strategy mechanics. Easily customizable for rule variants (International, Russian checkers), difficulty levels, and online multiplayee.

commandlinefoundations_boostyourproducti.human_name: Command Line Foundations: Boost Your Productivity as a Modern Software Developer
commandlinefoundations_boostyourproducti.description_text:
Stop avoiding the terminal and unlock the speed, automation, and power that command-line proficiency brings to your development workflow.

  • Navigate and manipulate files and directories efficiently.
  • Use essential Unix commands and understand when to apply them.
  • Automate repetitive tasks with shell scripts and command chains.
  • Manage version control, packages, and development tools from the terminal.
  • Integrate command-line tools into your daily development workflow.

This course is designed for developers who rely too heavily on GUIs and feel limited by it. By the end, you'll work faster and more efficiently by leveraging the command line as a natural extension of your skillset.

fromcodetocompletion_advancedgodot4progr.human_name: From Code to Completion: Advanced Godot 4 Programming for 3D Platformers
fromcodetocompletion_advancedgodot4progr.description_text:
Move beyond basic tutorials and master the sophisticated programming techniques that separate amateur projects from polished, professional-feeling 3D platformers.

  • Implement advanced character controllers with precise movement and feel.
  • Design camera systems that enhance gameplay and prevent motion sickness.
  • Create state machines and clean architectures for complex character behaviors.
  • Build level streaming and optimization systems for large 3D worlds.
  • Debug and refine physics, collision, and performance bottlenecks.

This course is designed for intermediate developers ready to level up their technical skills. By the end, you'll write cleaner, more maintainable code and create 3D platformers that feel responsive and professional.

buildlowpolygameworlds_designmodelsforgo.human_name: Build Low Poly Game Worlds: Design Models for Godot, Unity, and Unreal
buildlowpolygameworlds_designmodelsforgo.description_text:
Create stylish, performant 3D environments without the technical overhead and file sizes of high-poly models — perfect for indie developers and stylized games.

  • Design low poly models with efficient topology and clean geometry.
  • Create modular assets that combine into complete game environments.
  • Apply materials and textures that enhance the low poly aesthetic.
  • Optimize models for game engines across Godot, Unity, and Unreal.
  • Build complete scenes with lighting and composition that sell the style.

This course is designed for developers who want a distinctive visual style without massive art budgets. By the end, you'll create cohesive low poly worlds that look intentional, not limited.

moderngamedevelopmentwithgodot4gdscripta.human_name: Modern Game Development with Godot 4, GDScript and AI
moderngamedevelopmentwithgodot4gdscripta.description_text:
Stay relevant in an evolving industry by integrating AI tools and contemporary workflows that professional teams now consider standard practice.

  • Leverage AI assistants to accelerate your GDScript development.
  • Implement modern design patterns and architectural approaches.
  • Use AI for rapid prototyping, asset generation, and problem-solving.
  • Combine traditional game development with cutting-edge AI capabilities.
  • Adopt workflows that professional studios are embracing today.

This course is designed for developers who want to work smarter, not just harder. By the end, you'll have a modern, AI-enhanced workflow that increases your productivity and keeps you competitive in the game development landscape.

multiplayerlobbywithchat_godot463dgamete.human_name: Multiplayer Lobby with Chat - Godot 4.6 3D Game Template
multiplayerlobbywithchat_godot463dgamete.description_text:
Retire from the next hit game faster than ever before with this instant multiplayer template! Unlock an exclusive Godot 4.6 game template that lets you host private lobbies for friends or join sessions effortlessly using a room code.

With multiplayer synchronization, your new favorite template enables real-time interaction in a 3D environment, complete with player movement, rotation, and jumping that’s reflected across all connected users. With integrated 3D overhead chat and 2D sidebar chat systems, players can communicate dynamically as they explore and interact, creating a lively and connected gameplay experience.

Your ready-to-use template also includes a bubbly user interface that makes hosting and joining games smooth and intuitive right out of the box. Perfect for developers who want to save time and focus on crafting unique mechanics, worlds, and experiences without the heavy lifting. Start now!

godotforbeginners_learngamedevelopmentfr.human_name: Godot for Beginners: Learn Game Development from Scratch
godotforbeginners_learngamedevelopmentfr.description_text:
Overcome the intimidation of starting game development and build a solid foundation without getting lost in overly technical explanations.

  • Understand the Godot interface and fundamental concepts.
  • Create your first playable games with step-by-step guidance.
  • Learn essential programming concepts in GDScript naturally through game creation.
  • Build basic game mechanics like movement, collision, and scoring.
  • Progress from simple prototypes to complete, functioning games.

This course is designed for complete beginners with no prior game development experience. By the end, you'll have the confidence and foundational knowledge to pursue your game development journey independently.

gettingstartedwithgodot_editorandscripti.human_name: Getting Started with Godot: Editor & Scripting Foundations
gettingstartedwithgodot_editorandscripti.description_text:
Start your journey with Godot 4.6 by learning the essentials of its editor and scripting system. This course serves as the ideal introduction before moving on to more advanced projects, helping you understand how everything in Godot fits together.

You’ll begin with a guided tour of the Godot Editor, covering installation, scene organization, node hierarchies, and project settings. Then you’ll move into GDScript fundamentals, where you’ll learn how to attach scripts, work with variables and functions, use annotations like @export and @onready, and respond to input through simple examples.

Each lecture includes short, practical activities such as multiple-choice questions, fill-in-the-blank prompts, and code-based exercises that reinforce key concepts without overwhelming you.

By the end, you’ll feel confident navigating the editor, writing basic scripts, and understanding how scenes, nodes, and code work together, giving you the foundation needed to follow along easily in other Godot courses and projects.

godot4gamecodecollection_buildfasterwith.human_name: Godot 4 Game Code Collection: Build Faster with Game Templates and Code Snippets
godot4gamecodecollection_buildfasterwith.description_text:
Stop reinventing the wheel for common gameplay mechanics and systems — access battle-tested code you can drop into projects and customize immediately.

  • Access a comprehensive library of ready-to-use game code snippets.
  • Understand how each template works and how to modify it.
  • Implement common mechanics like inventory, dialogue, and save systems quickly.
  • Customize templates to match your specific game requirements.
  • Build games faster by combining proven code patterns.

This course is designed for developers who want to prototype and ship games faster. By the end, you'll have a personal code library that accelerates every project and eliminates repetitive implementation work.

makeaminimalist2dgeometrysurvivalgameing.human_name: Make a Minimalist 2D Geometry Survival Game in Godot 4.6 - From Scratch
makeaminimalist2dgeometrysurvivalgameing.description_text:
Build a fast-paced shape-dodging game while learning the fundamentals of 2D gameplay programming in Godot 4. This hands-on project focuses on reactive movement, collision systems, and smooth animation — all created entirely without external assets.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Draw and animate dynamic ring shapes using Polygon2D.
  • Control real-time rotation and input with _physics_process().
  • Detect and respond to collisions using Area2D and signals.
  • Apply tweens for scaling, shrinking, and smooth transitions.
  • Combine logic and design for simple but addictive gameplay.

Master the essentials of Godot’s 2D engine by building a fun, complete game from pure code and geometry — proving great gameplay doesn’t need art assets.

godot4leveldesignmasterclass_buildacompl.human_name: Godot 4 Level Design Masterclass: Build a Complete Ninja Adventure Game
godot4leveldesignmasterclass_buildacompl.description_text:
Experience the complete journey from empty scene to finished game by designing every level, challenge, and moment of a cohesive ninja adventure.

  • Plan and prototype level flows that support stealth and action gameplay.
  • Design enemy placements, patrol routes, and encounter spaces.
  • Create environmental puzzles and navigation challenges.
  • Build progression through areas with escalating difficulty and new mechanics.
  • Polish transitions, pacing, and narrative beats through level design.

This course is designed for developers who learn best by building complete projects. By the end, you'll understand how individual levels connect into a full game experience — and have a portfolio-ready ninja adventure to show for it.

mastering2dplatformerleveldesigningodot4.human_name: Mastering 2D Platformer Level Design in Godot 4: From Parkour Speedrunners to Themed Worlds
mastering2dplatformerleveldesigningodot4.description_text:
Transform flat, forgettable levels into memorable experiences that challenge players and support diverse playstyles, from precision speedrunning to exploratory adventure.

  • Design parkour sequences with flow, rhythm, and satisfying movement chains.
  • Create themed worlds with distinct visual identities and gameplay flavors.
  • Build levels that accommodate both speedrunners and casual players.
  • Implement difficulty curves and teaching moments through environmental design.
  • Balance challenge, pacing, and player progression across multiple stages.

This course is designed for developers who want their levels to be more than obstacle courses. By the end, you'll craft 2D platformer levels that players remember, replay, and praise for their thoughtful design.

particleffectmastery2dand3dingodot4withc.human_name: Particle Effect Mastery: 2D & 3D Visual FX in Godot 4 with C#
particleffectmastery2dand3dingodot4withc.description_text:
Add the visual polish and impact that transforms competent games into experiences players rave about, using particle systems and effects that communicate action and emotion.

  • Create explosive, dynamic particle effects for both 2D and 3D games.
  • Design visual feedback for abilities, impacts, and environmental effects.
  • Control particles through C# for responsive, gameplay-driven VFX.
